mapper.select: select id, workday, DATE_FORMAT(start_time, '%H:%i') as start_time, DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%H:%i') as end_time, work_time, over_time, empno from commuting WHERE empno = 123;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commuting(start_time, empno, over_time) VALUES (#{startTime}, #{empno}, #{overTime});
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(start_time, '%H:%i') from commuting WHERE DATE_FORMAT(workday, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{workday} AND empno=#{empno};
select DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%H:%i') from commuting WHERE DATE_FORMAT(workday, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{workday} AND empno=#{empno};
select distinct(DATE_FORMAT(workday, '%Y')) from commuting where empno=#{empno} order by (DATE_FORMAT(workday, '%Y')) desc
SELECT COUNT(over_time) FROM commuting WHERE over_time != "-" and empno = #{empno} AND DATE_FORMAT(workday, '%Y-%m') = #{workday};
SELECT COUNT(workday) FROM commuting WHERE empno=#{empno} AND DATE_FORMAT(workday,'%Y-%m')=#{workday} AND date_format(start_time,'%H:%i')>'09:10';
SELECT count(work_time) FROM commuting WHERE empno = ${empno} and cast(SUBSTRING_INDEX(work_time, '시간', 1) AS UNSIGNED) >= 9;
select empno, eposition, edepartment, total_holiday, used_holiday from employee_info where empno=#{empno}
select id, category, title, owner_id, owner, content, view_counts, date_format(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') create_date from bbs_notice where is_delete = 0 order by id desc limit 0, 5
select id, owner_id, owner, title, content, date_format(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') create_date, category, is_delete, view_counts from bbs where is_delete = 0 order by id desc limit 0, 5;
SELECT COUNT(approval) FROM holiday WHERE approval = '요청중' and empno = #{empno};
SELECT total_holiday, used_holiday FROM employee_info WHERE empno=#{empno};

SELECT cal_id, cal_title, cal_place, cal_start, date_format(cal_end, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%m') AS cal_end, cal_allday, cal_show, cal_recur, cal_content, c.empno as empno, check_admin, approval, p.name as ename FROM calendar c, personal_info p WHERE c.empno = p.empno AND #{today} between DATE_FORMAT(cal_start,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(cal_end,'%Y-%m-%d');
SELECT COUNT(VIEW) FROM message WHERE mreceiver_id = #{empno} AND VIEW=0;
